abilityDesc: When the equipped character inflicts 4 Flame DMG instances within 2 Cycles to the same opponent, apply Burn to that opponent. Opponents with Burn takes [$_1] increased Flame DMG and generates [$_2] Echo Memory. Maintainig Burn on the opponents will increase the aforementioned effects by [$_3], max [$_4]. Burn effect will be removed when the opponent no longer takes Flame DMG.
